reviewText: My 4 year old absolutely loves this dvd set and watches it over and over! These dvd's aren't the current animated Fireman Sam but my son doesn't seem to mind; he likes them just the same, if not more.
My son loves Fireman Sam and this DVD did not disappoint.  He hadn't seen the old style Sam before, but it has become his favorite.
Great quality DVD, prompt delivery. I have watched it soo much since Easter, I hope it doesn't scratch easily. ;-)
This was recommended by a little two year old boy whose parents are British.  I gave it to my grandson who's 3, and he also loves it.  Fun gift especially when accompanied by a toy firetruck.

Teaches a giving and caring attitude.  Doesn't make fun of adults.  Teaches safety
issues.  My grandson now wants to become a fireman.
My 3 year old loves it.  The 2-sided DVD is a good deal and works well once you figure out which side is which.
This is a great dvd.  It has a variety of videos that keep my son entertained.  He loves to watch this over and over.  It was a good purchase.
